nodes.label: Teor's Recruitment by House Halovar
nodes.description: Teor hired as bodyguard for Wicander Halovar and directed to Mercanaud Couturier

nodes.label: Marketplace Encounter
nodes.description: Brief encounter between Julien Davinos and Teor Pridesire in Ogrimock Marketplace
outcomes: Teor reveals alliance with Candescent Creed
Julien recognizes Teor as Thjazi's companion
Julien realizes Teor being sent to Mercanaud Couturier

nodes.label: Revelation in the Cellar
nodes.description: Wicander Halovar confronts imprisoned celestial grandfather and learns truth about Candescent Creed
outcomes: Truth about Candescent Creed revealed as fabrication
Discussion of arranged marriage to Ebecca D'Antonio
Tyranny reveals her contract with Wick personally

nodes.label: Lord Primus at the Penteveral
nodes.description: Lord Primus Tachonis searches for his son Occtis and attempts to curse Murray
outcomes: Murray senses curse not cast by Primus himself

nodes.label: Battle at the Crow Keepers' Guild
nodes.description: Combat erupts at Crow Keepers headquarters, Vaelus kills Solomon
nodes.location: The Guard Tower (Crow Keepers headquarters), Caravan Hill
outcomes: Thimble captured in sack then freed
Vaelus kills two Crow Keepers including Solomon

nodes.label: Casimir's Betrayal Revealed
nodes.description: Through interrogation, group learns Casimir betrayed them and paid off his debt
items: Deed of title to stronghouse in Gormalay
outcomes: Casimir pays off massive debt in full
Cyd arrives searching for rescue wagon

nodes.label: The Hallowed Round Tour
nodes.description: Hal shows Thaisha and Shadia renovated amphitheater, receives mysterious paint from Thjazi
nodes.location: The Hallowed Round theater (base of Dol-Makjar)
items: Paint shipment from Thjazi (six crates in amphorae)
outcomes: Bolaire senses magical disturbance under city
Thaisha asks woods to protect family

nodes.label: Murray and Azune's Strategy Meeting
nodes.description: Murray and Azune meet in alley to share intelligence about noble house threats
outcomes: Information shared about Lord Knight Einfasen's threats
Discussion of Lord Primus Tachonis at Penteveral
Decision to find Occtis before House Tachonis
Plan to go to Caravan Hill tavern

nodes.label: Teor's Torture at Mercanaud Couturier
nodes.description: Teor drugged and tortured by fiendish tailors, shadow being severed
nodes.location: Mercanaud Couturier (back fitting room), Ogrimock Marketplace
outcomes: Two Hold Person spells paralyze Teor

nodes.label: Rescue at the Couturier
nodes.description: Wicander and Tyranny rescue Teor from Mercanaud Couturier
outcomes: Wick casts Lesser Restoration on Teor

nodes.label: Gathering at Halandil's Home
nodes.description: Multiple groups converge at Hal's home, learn of mutual danger, form party to leave city
outcomes: Teor warns about Candescent Creed evil
Wick reveals truth about his family
Life debt sworn by Teor to Wick
Group realizes five members in danger
Decision to leave city for Gormalay
Azune decides to remain in city
Hal discovers Lloy family maker's mark on Thjazi's sword
Hal straps Liar's Blade to his back
Wick realizes Halovars have property in Gormalay

nodes.label: Julien's Confrontation with Thimble
nodes.description: Julien grabs Thimble by wings, confirms Occtis in danger
outcomes: Occtis speaks and voice recognized by Julien
Julien warns Occtis is in danger

nodes.label: Occtis Taken to Palazzo Davinos
nodes.description: Julien brings Occtis and Vaelus to Palazzo Davinos for protection
outcomes: Occtis brought for protection from family
Aranessa reveals Lord Primus visited Penteveral
Mention of Royce castle in Golden Orchard
Mention of Tachonis castle in Death
Occtis denies involvement in rescue plot
Occtis agrees to stay at Palazzo

nodes.label: Vaelus Opens Gate for Wolf
nodes.description: Vaelus senses approaching wolf and uses Command to open Palazzo gate
outcomes: Magical connection between Vaelus and Thaisha established

nodes.label: Garden Conversation
nodes.description: Julien and Vaelus discuss ominous feelings in Palazzo gardens
outcomes: Julien expresses bad feeling about night
Julien admits he can trust Vaelus
Vaelus uses Divine Sense on Julien
Vaelus senses hundreds of restless dead
Vaelus senses curse on Julien's shadow

nodes.label: Assassination of General Raimond
nodes.description: Black-clad Tachonis assassin kills General Raimond by ethereally removing his skull
outcomes: Raimond attempts to speak to Julien
Ethereal hand reaches through Raimond's flesh
Skull pulled out of head immaterially

nodes.label: Attack on Occtis
nodes.description: Ethrand Tachonis and six ghouls attack Occtis with intent to implant black stone
items: Perfectly spherical black stone with wings
outcomes: Six ghouls bearing Tachonis symbols appear
Plan revealed to 'open him up' and implant stone

nodes.label: The Soldiers Depart Dol-Makjar
nodes.description: Five endangered individuals leave city on horseback heading north to Gormalay
outcomes: Azune recites names of fallen Falconers' Rebellion fighters
Group heads north to find Casimir and Cyd
Mission to seek vengeance for Thjazi
Wicander struggles with concept of sleeping outside
Teor commits to life debt service

nodes.label: Teor Pridesire
nodes.description: Lion-headed Nama warrior, paladin, brother of Cyd, former Torn Banner member

nodes.label: Wicander Halovar
nodes.description: Young lord of House Halovar, Light Priest of Candescent Creed, grandson of celestial

nodes.label: Aspirant Tyranny
nodes.description: Demon working toward redemption, contracted to Wicander personally

nodes.label: Thimble
nodes.description: Fairy warrior, Thjazi's partner in crime, seeking vengeance

nodes.label: Kattigan Vale
nodes.description: Ranger with wolf companion Wulfric, former Torn Banner, has black eye from bar fight

nodes.label: Vaelus
nodes.description: Ancient elf warrior from Sisters of Sylandri, seeking Stone of Nightsong

nodes.label: Sir Julien Davinos
nodes.description: Knight of House Davinos, cursed nobleman, son of deceased general

nodes.label: Occtis Tachonis
nodes.description: Young wizard of House Tachonis, eighth child, necromancer with undead fox

nodes.label: Halandil Fang
nodes.description: Half-orc theater owner, Thjazi's brother, now wielding Liar's Blade
relationships: Father of Shadia, Hero, and Alogar

nodes.label: Thaisha Lloy
nodes.description: Druid of Circle of Ancients, half-orc, seeking her son Occtis

nodes.label: Murray Mag'Nesson
nodes.description: Dwarven wizard, Bursar of Penteveral, has gemstone teeth, exhausted

nodes.label: Bolaire Lathalia
nodes.description: Curator of Lloy Wing at The Archanade, warlock, delivered Thjazi's paint

nodes.label: Azune Nayar
nodes.description: Dwarf Arcane Marshal of Revolutionary Guard, former Torn Banner member

nodes.label: Lady Aranessa Royce
nodes.description: Widow of Thjazi Fang, Lady of House Royce, questioning Occtis

nodes.label: Photarch Yanessa Halovar
nodes.description: Matriarch of House Halovar, grandmother of Wicander, creator of Candescent Creed

nodes.label: General Raimond Davinos
nodes.description: Father of Julien, general of House Davinos, assassinated by House Tachonis

nodes.label: Lord Primus Tachonis
nodes.description: Head of House Tachonis, father of Occtis and Ethrand, searching for son

nodes.label: Ethrand Tachonis
nodes.description: Brother of Occtis, commanding ghouls to implant black stone

nodes.label: Casimir Gavendale
nodes.description: Former Torn Banner member, betrayed group, embezzled from Crow Keepers

nodes.label: Talcydimir 'Cyd' Pridesire
nodes.description: Brother of Teor, wagon driver for Revolutionary Council, stole deed
nodes.status: Fled with deed to Gormalay stronghouse

nodes.label: Solomon
nodes.description: Guildmaster of Crow Keepers, killed by Vaelus

nodes.label: Sir Filoneus Halovar
nodes.description: Knight of House Halovar, uncle of Wicander, has magical war dogs
items: War dogs Wrath and Judgment (anti-magic song)

nodes.label: Shadia
nodes.description: Daughter of Hal and Thaisha, theater company member, juggler

nodes.label: Villa Aurora
nodes.description: Home of Candescent Creed and House Halovar, contains secret cellar with imprisoned celestial

nodes.label: Ogrimock Marketplace
nodes.description: Marketplace with arcane magic forbidden by law, contains Mercanaud Couturier

nodes.label: Mercanaud Couturier
nodes.description: Tailor shop run by fiendish twins who dispose of Halovar problems

nodes.label: The Penteveral
nodes.description: Magic college under threat from Lord Primus Tachonis and nobles

nodes.label: The Guard Tower
nodes.description: Tavern and headquarters of Crow Keepers thieves' guild in Caravan Hill

nodes.label: The Hallowed Round
nodes.description: Ancient amphitheater being renovated by Hal, former site of Azgra worship
nodes.location: Base of Dol-Makjar, edge of Tintazy Wood
history: Former worship site for Azgra (god of war)

nodes.label: Palazzo Davinos
nodes.description: Beautiful estate of House Davinos, site of General Raimond's assassination

nodes.label: Halandil Fang's Home
nodes.description: Home in The Rookery where Thjazi's wake was held, gathering point for endangered group
features: Iron nail of Lloy family overhead

nodes.label: Caravan Hill
nodes.description: Lower neighborhood, merchant district, home to Crow Keepers and site of patrol

nodes.label: Falcon's Rest
nodes.description: Memorial at Grey Tower stables honoring fallen of Falconers' Rebellion

nodes.label: Gormalay
nodes.description: Northern stronghold destination in Timmony region where Casimir fled

nodes.label: Dvalmar Pass
nodes.description: Eastern mountain pass where House Royce caravan was stopped
significance: House Royce supply wagons stopped here

nodes.label: The Rookery
nodes.description: High neighborhood in Dol-Makjar where Hal lives

nodes.label: The Archanade
nodes.description: Museum with multiple wings including Lloy Wing curated by Bolaire

nodes.label: Candescent Creed
nodes.description: False religion created by House Halovar using captured celestial's essence

nodes.label: House Halovar
nodes.description: Sundered House, former Priestly Family of Flame, creators of Candescent Creed
history: Right hand of Obridimian royal house

nodes.label: House Tachonis
nodes.description: Sundered House, Priestly Family of Shadow, controls castle in Death realm
actions: Stopped Royce caravan at Dvalmar Pass

nodes.label: House Davinos
nodes.description: Vassal house of House Royce, affected by Tachonis assassination

nodes.label: House Royce
nodes.description: Sundered House with sorcerous power, owns castle in Golden Orchard
holdings: Castle in Golden Orchard (halfway to Faerie)

nodes.label: Crow Keepers
nodes.description: Oldest thieves' guild in Dol-Makjar, suffered attack by Vaelus

nodes.label: Revolutionary Guard
nodes.description: City guard being privatized and controlled by noble houses

nodes.label: Arcane Marshals
nodes.description: Magic law enforcement currently safe from noble takeover

nodes.label: Sundered Houses / Chamber of Lords-Advisory
nodes.description: Coalition of noble houses consolidating power over Dol-Makjar

nodes.label: Torn Banner
nodes.description: Former mercenary group from Falconer's Rebellion
artifact: Half of banner given to Teor by Loza

nodes.label: The Soldiers
nodes.description: Newly formed party of five fleeing Dol-Makjar

nodes.label: Filament
nodes.description: Bodily fluid of imprisoned celestial Aetheon used as holy substance
properties: Can be diluted with D'Antonio vineyard fruit

nodes.label: Liar's Blade
nodes.description: Sword forged by Lloy family for ancient war, wielded by Thjazi, now carried by Hal
marks: Maker's mark resembles half mask with smirking tongue
Actually smiling face in profile when viewed from angle

nodes.label: Stone of Nightsong
nodes.description: Stolen artifact sought by Vaelus, sold by Casimir
nodes.status: Sold by Casimir (likely to fund his debt payment)
nodes.origin: Stolen from Thimble and Thjazi's hideout during betrayal

nodes.label: Spherical Black Stone with Wings
nodes.description: Perfectly spherical black stone held by Ethrand Tachonis

nodes.label: Mysterious Paint Shipment
nodes.description: Six crates of magically-residued paint sent by Thjazi to Hal
properties: Either magic happened near it or unknown magic type

nodes.label: Pincushion
nodes.description: Undead fox familiar created by Occtis from multiple fox parts
nodes.creator: Occtis Tachonis
properties: Made from parts of multiple foxes

nodes.label: Deed to Gormalay Stronghouse
nodes.description: Property deed stolen by Cyd from Casimir

nodes.label: Closure of Faerie Doors
nodes.description: Doors to Faerie closed due to overflow of souls from death of gods
nodes.cause: Death of gods caused souls unable to move to afterlife, threatened heart of Faerie

nodes.label: Prismatic Retort
nodes.description: Secret basement chamber in Villa Aurora containing imprisoned celestial
nodes.purpose: Source of Filament for Candescent Creed
nodes.access: Known to senior Halovar family members

edges.description: Recruitment leads to revelation in cellar
Julien observes Teor heading to recruitment
Revelation that Teor's assassination already arranged
Wicander decides to rescue Teor after learning truth
Murray escapes to find Azune after confrontation
Information about Casimir brought to gathering
Hal and Thaisha return from theater to gathering
Murray and Azune head toward tavern where battle occurs
Wicander and Tyranny rescue Teor from torture
Rescue party arrives at Hal's home
Gathering decides five must leave city
Julien confronts group outside Hal's home
Vaelus leaves conversation to open gate
Attack on Occtis occurs while others in garden
Learns truth about family and Creed
Present for revelation, already knew truth
Kills Solomon and thief, saves group
Voice recognized by Julien despite disguise
Recites names of fallen as Soldiers depart
Site of battle with Crow Keepers
Site of theater tour and paint delivery
Teor warns group about evil nature
Secret of family exposed to Wicander
Owns property and ships Filament there
Deed stolen by Cyd from Casimir
Cyd grabbed and fled with deed
Owes life to Wicander for rescue
Demon placed in Creed six months ago
Mystical bond, opened gate for wolf
Julien admits he can trust Vaelus
Occtis is eighth son of Lord Primus
Friends, Azune staying to help Hal
Lord Primus attempted curse on Murray
Source of Filament exposed as imprisoned celestial
Paint delivered with note from Thjazi
Back room used for disposing problems
Vaelus senses hundreds of restless dead
House created false religion for power
The Soldiers heading north to Gormalay
